mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, P.* FROM ( SELECT ani_product.productno, ani_product.productname, ani_product.content , ani_product.price , ani_product.amount, ani_product.category, ani_product.userno, ani_product_img.pimgstored , ani_product.reviewcount FROM ani_product, ani_product_img WHERE ani_product.productno = ani_product_img.productno(+) ORDER BY ani_product.productno DESC, ani_product_img.productno DESC ) P ) PRODUCT WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
mapper.insert: insert into ani_product ( productno, kind, category, productname, price, amount, content ) values ( #{productno }, #{kind }, #{category}, #{productname }, #{price }, #{amount }, #{content } )

select ani_product_img_seq.nextval from dual
insert into ani_product_img (pimgno, pimgorigin, pimgstored, productno) values ( #{pimgno }, #{pimgorigin }, #{pimgstored }, #{productno })
mapper.select: select reviewno, reviewcontent, insertdate, productno, userno, usernick from ani_review where productno = #{productno } order by reviewno
mapper.insert: insert into ani_review ( reviewno, reviewcontent, insertdate, productno, userno, usernick) values (ani_review_seq.nextval, #{reviewcontent }, sysdate, #{productno }, #{userno }, #{usernick })
